resources.string: Please take a picture of your skin lesion. Make sure the lesion image are covered up to 80% of the image. We will provide you the analysis based on the datasets we used.
Nothings are found. Seems your skin is normal.

Tschandl, Philipp, 2018, "The HAM10000 dataset, 
a large collection of multi-source dermatoscopic 
images of common pigmented skin lesions", 
https://doi,org/10.7910/DVN/DBW86T, 
Harvard Dataverse."
for providing us Artificial Intelligence training \nthrough Digital Talent Scholarship 2018 \nprogram.
